Based on the current state of the game and my position, the next strategic action is to collect the key located at (4, 1) on the map. I need this key in order to eventually unlock the goal located at (7, 11).

Currently, my options are limited by the walls. Given that I am positioned at (1, 3) where the enemy (monsterSlow, denoted by '&') is located, the best move is to go left to (1, 2) where there is no enemy or obstacle, allowing me to navigate towards the key.

Thus, I will take the following action:

``` Action:2 ```

This action will help me create distance from the enemy while also making a move towards accessing the key. My expectation is that I will safely avoid confrontation and be able to strategize my next move effectively.
